title: Rainbow Rod
summaries: The Rainbow Rod is a Hardmode magic weapon that launches a controllable projectile, just like the Flamelash or Magic Missile, and can be considered an upgraded version of them.

The projectile it fires is a white-sparkling missile with a rainbow trail, and emits a moderate amount of light that rotates through the entire color spectrum / a light orb shifting through rainbow colors with a rainbow trail. It can be controlled by holding ⚒ Use / Attack and moving the cursor. If ⚒ Use / Attack is released mid-drag, the missile will be flung in that direction. If the cursor is stationary on release, it continues along the angle formed from the player.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, if any enemies are nearby, the missile will home in on them. The missile will not disappear when touching a <linked>block</linked> if it is being manually controlled. It can move through <linked>liquids</linked> (unlike the Flamelash), and can pierce twice before exploding and dealing damage in a small area.
